Our professional development continues to include an emphasis on the delivery of the BARK code of conduct inside and outside of\rthe classroom and we seek professional learning experiences that as well maintain and improve our staff wellness.\r\rFY 2017-18 Teacher and Administrative SalariesFY 2017-18 Expenditures Per Pupil and School Site Teacher Salaries\rState Average forAverage\rDistrict\rCategory\rDistricts In SameLevelTotalRestrictedUnrestrictedTeacher\rAmount\rCategory\rSalary\rBeginning Teacher Salary$40
